name: tipyourserver
description: 1. Create a directory called `node-fs-hw` in the terminal. 2. Go into the `node-fs-hw` directory. 3. In the terminal, create a file named `server.js` using the `touch` command. 4. In the terminal, initialize a Node.js project by running the following commands:    - `npm init -y`    - `npm install` 5. Make sure that the `main` property in the `package.json` file is set to `server.js`. 6. In the `server.js` file, create a Node.js server and make it listen on port 3000.
